sections.heading: consumer provisions; applicability
sections.text: Sections 8-2603.01, 8-2608.01, 8-2608.02, 8-2608.03, and 8-2609.01 shall not apply to any person or entity that maintains a database used solely for the following:(1) Criminal record information;(2) Personal loss history information;(3) Fraud prevention or detectio
03, and 8-2609.01 shall not apply to any person or entity that maintains a database used solely for the following:
